reports.exportDescription: Export all application data for backup or reporting purposes.
reports.exportWordDescription: Export all data in Word format for printing or sharing.
reports.exportWordDetails: This will generate a comprehensive Word document with project details, progress updates, and payment information.
reports.exportPDFDescription: Export all data in PDF format for printing or sharing.
reports.exportPDFDetails: This will generate a comprehensive PDF report with project details, progress updates, and payment information.
reports.printDescription: Generate printable reports for projects, progress, and payments.
reports.printDetails: Select a report type to generate a printable document with comprehensive project information.
reports.projectsDescription: Overview of all projects in the system

index.projectManagementDescription: Manage your ongoing projects and track their progress efficiently.
index.progressTrackingDescription: Track daily progress and monitor completion status of various tasks.
index.paymentsDescription: Manage payment requests and view payment history.
index.step1: Create a new project from the Projects menu
index.step2: Add progress updates daily to track work completed
index.step3: Submit payment requests as milestones are completed
